channel.title: Comments on: Lime Crime Velvetine in Pink Velvet

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/lime-crime-velvetine-pink-velvet/#comment-625">Suzi</a>.
Girl, YES! These are easier to work with. I didn't even think about that! That little wand applicator is much more predictable.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Suzi.

Girl, YES! These are easier to work with. I didn’t even think about that! That little wand applicator is much more predictable.

item.title: By: Suzi
item.dc:creator: Suzi
item.description: I might have to check these out. I love the concept of Lip Tar, but no matter how many times I practice I just can't quite get the hang of it. The stickiness makes spreading it evenly more difficult. This applicator looks much easier!
item.content:encoded: I might have to check these out. I love the concept of Lip Tar, but no matter how many times I practice I just can’t quite get the hang of it. The stickiness makes spreading it evenly more difficult. This applicator looks much easier!
